          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_46651481a2e9efcb96e099be2b25e25f43dfe701</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alpha particle scattering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphateilchenzerstreuen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispersion de particules d'alpha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dispersar da partícula de alfa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dispersione della particella di alfa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασπορά άλφα μορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dispersión de la partícula alfa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates how alpha particles are scattered as their path gets nearer the nucleus of a gold atom.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alpha particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atomic nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">backscattering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gold foil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht, wie Alphateilchen 
zerstreut werden, während ihr Pfad nahe den Kern eines Goldatoms 
erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre comment des particules d'alpha
sont dispersées pendant que leur voie d'accès obtient plus près le 
noyau d'un atome d'or.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra como as partículas de alfa são
dispersadas enquanto seu trajeto começa mais próximo o núcleo de um
átomo do ouro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra come le particelle di alfa 
sono sparse mentre il loro percorso ottiene più vicino il nucleo di 
un atomo dell'oro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί πώς τα άλφα μόρια είναι 
διεσπαρμένα δεδομένου ότι το μονοπάτι τους παίρνει πλησιέστερα 
τον πυρήνα ενός χρυσού ατόμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra cómo se dispersan las 
partículas alfa mientras que su camino consigue más cerca el núcleo
de un átomo del oro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphateilchen</string>
          </keyword>
